about.title: About Me
about.text1: Passionate frontend developer with 2 years of non-commercial experience building modern web applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks.
about.text2: I'm constantly learning and keeping up with the latest web technologies and best practices.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Creating intuitive and beautiful user experiences

mobile.title: Mobile First
mobile.description: Ensuring optimal experience on all devices

hexletCert.title: Fullstack Development Certification
hexletCert.description: Comprehensive course covering modern JavaScript, React, and advanced CSS techniques. Includes hands-on projects and real-world case studies.

brainGames.title: BrainGames
brainGames.description: A collection of five terminal-based games inspired by popular mobile brain-training apps.

mindScape.title: MindScape
mindScape.description: A browser-based web app for storing and managing personal notes with ease.

codeAndSpell.title: Code&Spell
codeAndSpell.description: An educational programming simulator set in a magical world, where players learn core programming concepts through interactive visualisation.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and exciting projects. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate!
